typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ntt_breathingspacedebtor_inss_inssaddressid as string,
		inss_inssaddressid as string,
		ntt_breathingspacedebtorid as string,
		intBatchId as integer,
		partdist as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	format: 'parquet') ~> sourceStaging
sourceStaging derive(strNTTBreathingSpaceDebtorInssInssAddressId = toString(ntt_breathingspacedebtor_inss_inssaddressid),
		strInssInssAddressId = toString(inss_inssaddressid),
		strNTTBreathingSpaceDebtorId = toString(ntt_breathingspacedebtorid)) ~> decolTypeConvertion
decolTypeConvertion derive(blIsValid = iif(isNull(strNTTBreathingSpaceDebtorInssInssAddressId) || isNull(strInssInssAddressId) || isNull(strNTTBreathingSpaceDebtorId), toBoolean('0'), toBoolean('1'))) ~> dcolIsValid
dcolIsValid derive(strNTTBreathingSpaceDebtorInssInssAddressId = coalesce(strNTTBreathingSpaceDebtorInssInssAddressId,'missing'),
		strInssInssAddressId = coalesce(strInssInssAddressId, 'missing'),
		strNTTBreathingSpaceDebtorId = coalesce(strNTTBreathingSpaceDebtorId, 'missing')) ~> dcolMandatoryValue
dcolMandatoryValue derive(blIsTruncate = iif(length(strNTTBreathingSpaceDebtorInssInssAddressId) > 36 || length(strInssInssAddressId) > 36 || length(strNTTBreathingSpaceDebtorId) > 36, toBoolean('1'), toBoolean('0'))) ~> dcolIsTruncate
dcolIsTruncate derive(strNTTBreathingSpaceDebtorInssInssAddressId = left(strNTTBreathingSpaceDebtorInssInssAddressId, 36),
		strInssInssAddressId = left(strInssInssAddressId, 36),
		strNTTBreathingSpaceDebtorId = left(strNTTBreathingSpaceDebtorId, 36)) ~> dcolMandatoryTruncate
dcolMandatoryTruncate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkValidation
